title: SUBMISSION GUIDELINES
body:
Hey guys welcome to my new account! So my new username is irxnspxder. I don’t honestly know what I’m going to be posting yet but I’m pretty excited to see where this goes. I am going to add a few rules.

1. Please don’t hate in any way shape or form

-just don’t threaten people if they don’t like the same things as you or call people rude things or tell people to shut up. It just doesn’t feel great.

2. Respect people’s opinions

3. You can message me for whatever reason I’m happy to talk :)

4. Please don’t spam

5. Try to keep cussing to a minimum

- I personally don’t have a problem with it just don’t do it too much for other people’s sake

6. Plz don’t talk about things that don’t have to do with Marvel

- this account is just for fun it’s not meant for arguments over politics or anything really serious unless this page is being impacted by it then I will do something about it

7. Fanfiction is allowed and encouraged but please do not submit smut.

8. Don’t be afraid to give spoilers just make sure to put a warning beforehand

9. You are free to share links to videos or pictures just once more it must be related to marvel or it will be taken down

10. Please do not share any personal issues for your sake. If you have a problem you need to talk to someone in your life or someone you know that has experienced it. Please do not confide in strangers. If you decide to do so please do not do it on this page.

11. Posts are highly encouraged to be submitted as well as asks.

-the point of this account is hopefully you all submit posts that you love and want to share. Yes most of these rules probably won’t be violated bc everything goes through me first but sometimes things go over my head which is why I must establish them just in case.

Once again this page is for fun and games no harm is meant and if someone is offended by something message or tag me and I will declare whether or not it should be taken down. If one person does post more then 5 posts that are declared as offensive or rude you will be blocked. This is meant to be a safe space for kids who are bullied or people who want to get away from school or people who just want to talk about marvel. They don’t need something else to worry about. Anyways I hope you all understand and just have fun!

blog.name: atomicgalaxybisexual
blog.title: I have a great taste in food and people
blog.description:
African American | Bisexual | ENFP 
| Gemini | Hufflepuff |       

I'm ready to face any challenge foolish enough to face me

body:
Avengers as Quotes I’ve heard

T'Challa: I’m gonna be a cat because I’ll be all cute and shit, then I’ll turn and be like “MEOW BITCH.” and scratch out your eyes.

Erik Killmonger: I’m not saying I hate everyone but, If it weren’t for the law, you’d all be dead right now.

Shuri: *hugs phone* I’ve never loved anything so much, until now

Nakia: I never had to say I was a badass, everybody just knows.

Okoye: I NEED TO PROTECT MY CHILDREN, THEY ARE DUMD AND WILL KILL THEMSELVES IF I DO NOT!!!!!!!!!!

M'Baku: Im basically the guy who keeps people from falling off cliffs

Starlord: Just because I listen to Africa every time I take a nap doesn’t mean I’m obsessed with 80s music.

Rocket: I’ve been told I have the personality of spoiled milk, jokes on them I’m lactose intolerant.

Groot: Everytime I throw away a piece of paper I think, “a tree died for this.”, oh well *throws another paper away*

Gamora: So my family reunions are awkward, it’s not my fault everyone is trying to kill each other

Drax: Why does everyone say, “I Literally can’t even.” Obviously you “can even.” You just don’t want to.

Tony Stark: I used to be a genius as a kid, and now I’m debating over whether a hotdog is a sandwich, with a five year old

Black Widow: Some guy told me I fought like a girl, I said “yes, I do.” And punched him in the throat

Thor: THUNDER FEEL THE THUNDER *stomps 3 times furiously* LIGHTNING AND THE THUNDER

Loki: I’m in rejected children club, we would have meetings, but our advisor said he had to go to the grocery store………..oh wait

Valkeryie: *grabs a bunch of cigarettes and a lighter* IT’S A METAPHOR HAZEL GRACE

Hulk: I only have two emotions, anger and an all CONSUMING RAGE

Hawkeye: Everyone else makes worthwhile contributions, and all I offer is a stick, it’s not a good stick but- oh, it’s broken

Captain America: Can you hate America while still wanting to help it?

Vision: to the girl that said I have the personality of a robot, I have a message for you, 01000111 01101111 00100000 01000110 01110101 01100011 01101011 00100000 01011001 01101111 01110101 01110010 01110011 01100101 01101100 01100110

Scarlet Witch: My favorite color is red because it rhymes with DEAD

Ant-Man: Insects are here to help us-*sees a wasp* you don’t count bitch.

Falcon: *Studies for a test, still gets a bad grade* What type of bullshit-

War Machine: It’s not easy living under your attractive, best friend’s shadow

Spiderman: most of my friends are older than me, and call me their son. I never agreed to that title, but it’s too late to change now.

Shuri: *hugs phone* I’ve never loved anything so much, until now

Nakia: I never had to say I was a badass, everybody just knows.

Okoye: I NEED TO PROTECT MY CHILDREN, THEY ARE DUMD AND WILL KILL THEMSELVES IF I DO NOT!!!!!!!!!!

M'Baku: Im basically the guy who keeps people from falling off cliffs

Starlord: Just because I listen to Africa every time I take a nap doesn’t mean I’m obsessed with 80s music.

Rocket: I’ve been told I have the personality of spoiled milk, jokes on them I’m lactose intolerant.

Groot: Everytime I throw away a piece of paper I think, “a tree died for this.”, oh well *throws another paper away*

Gamora: So my family reunions are awkward, it’s not my fault everyone is trying to kill each other

Drax: Why does everyone say, “I Literally can’t even.” Obviously you “can even.” You just don’t want to.

Tony Stark: I used to be a genius as a kid, and now I’m debating over whether a hotdog is a sandwich, with a five year old

Black Widow: Some guy told me I fought like a girl, I said “yes, I do.” And punched him in the throat

Thor: THUNDER FEEL THE THUNDER *stomps 3 times furiously* LIGHTNING AND THE THUNDER

Loki: I’m in rejected children club, we would have meetings, but our advisor said he had to go to the grocery store………..oh wait

Valkeryie: *grabs a bunch of cigarettes and a lighter* IT’S A METAPHOR HAZEL GRACE

Hulk: I only have two emotions, anger and an all CONSUMING RAGE

Hawkeye: Everyone else makes worthwhile contributions, and all I offer is a stick, it’s not a good stick but- oh, it’s broken

Captain America: Can you hate America while still wanting to help it?

Vision: to the girl that said I have the personality of a robot, I have a message for you, 01000111 01101111 00100000 01000110 01110101 01100011 01101011 00100000 01011001 01101111 01110101 01110010 01110011 01100101 01101100 01100110

Scarlet Witch: My favorite color is red because it rhymes with DEAD

Ant-Man: Insects are here to help us-*sees a wasp* you don’t count bitch.

Falcon: *Studies for a test, still gets a bad grade* What type of bullshit-

War Machine: It’s not easy living under your attractive, best friend’s shadow

Spiderman: most of my friends are older than me, and call me their son. I never agreed to that title, but it’s too late to change now.

Thomas. 23. Italian. Male. Feminist. Literal Pile of Salt. Asexual. Aromantic. Bisexual. Massive Nerd.
English isn't my first language. Ravenclaw. Evil Overlord. I tend to be Sappy about my OTPs and Salty about my NOTPs.

summary: Do not, by any circumstances, read Avengers Vol 1 #200.
body:
I’ve just seen a post mentioning some Marvel Comics featuring Captain Marvel/Carol Denvers in case people wanted to read about her before the movie comes out, and I’m gona do a PSA now so I can warn Ya’ll before it’s too late:

Whatever it happens…

Do not, by any circumstances, read Avengers Vol 1 #200.

Carol is in it and is a centre character, but I assure you, in this day and age? It will ruin your enjoyment of comics due to the godawful context and implications.

Because avenger vol 1 #200? In layman terms?

Is the story about Carol giving birth to her magical mind controlling r*p*st before marrying him and being forced to elope with and to go hell dimension with him, and the Avengers find nothing wrong with that.

And it was done as an attempt to write Carol out of comics, much like the killing joke was supposed to write Barbara out of comics.

So, rule of thumb: If you stumble upon it when searching for Carol Denvers comics to read, or some asshole suggests you to read it because you have shown interest in the character, Do yourself a favor, and do not read it.

This has been a PSA,

summary: 闖禍了！Mark Ruffalo 大意爆出《Avengers 4》資訊遭導演開除！
title: 闖禍了！Mark Ruffalo 大意爆出《Avengers 4》資訊遭導演開除！
body:
雖然《Captain Marvel》的預告片已經正式推出，但大家看來仍是對 Marvel 的大片《Avengers 4》比較感興趣。早前導演 Russo 兄弟發佈了一張圖片請大家「Look Hard」，不少影迷都推測是他們給大家《Avengers 4》標題的提示，而當中以「End Game」的呼聲最大。可以近日《MCU Cosmic》卻有可靠消息指《Avengers 4》的標題將會以《Avengers: Annihilation》為名，而這也與 2006 年由 Keith Giffen 創作的 Marvel 漫畫名《Annihilation》相符。正當人們為事件進行熱烈討論之時，在《Avengers》中飾演 Hulk 的 Mark Ruffalo 看來又再次在節目中意外爆出《Avengers 4》的標題，更在 Twitter 上希望主持人替他剪走該片段，實在是傻得可愛！

Mark Ruffalo 在節目中被 Jimmy Fallon 問及可否透露《Avengers 4》的片名，怎料 Mark Ruffalo 竟然一口答應，更笑言片名已經洩漏出去了，但當他說出下一部《Avengers》的片名的時候就被消音處理，可以單看現場觀眾驚訝的反應就可以得知片名絕對讓人驚喜。而早於節目播出前，Mark Ruffalo 就於 Twitter 上向 Jimmy Fallon 說希望他可以把自己在節目中說漏嘴的東西刪剪掉，更拜托對方不要再讓他陷入麻煩了。更有趣的是電影導演 Russo 兄弟竟然留言說「Mark Ruffalo 你被開除了」，雖然大家都了解只是說笑，但這樣不是讓《Avengers: Annihilation》這個片久的消息來得更真實嗎？

延伸閱讀：

第 55 屆金馬獎入圍名單出爐，怎麼會引起台灣人的不滿？

這麼快就鬧不和？Dakota Johnson 竟然直指跟「雷神」合作是一個錯誤…

連 Meghan Markle 也支持，《Being Serena》就是一部屬於時代女性的紀錄片！

Follow us on Facebook: fb.com/POPBEE
Follow us on Instagram: Instagram.com/POPBEE
